catalog_info.title: Endocrinology and Behavior: Research Seminar
catalog_info.notes:
This course includes a mandatory two-hour laboratory section per week. Students will be given the option to choose either Monday or Wednesday afternoon for their laboratory section. Preference given to Human Evolutionary Biology concentrators. Lab safety training required (after enrollment).
This course counts towards the research seminar requirement in HEB.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Human Evolutionary Biology 1310 or Life Sciences 2 or with permission of instructor.
catalog_info.description: An introduction to laboratory techniques and research design in behavioral endocrinology. Students conduct pilot research projects.
